turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks near 25th at University Village in Seattle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like an iced or hot Americano?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many shots would you like in the Americano?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your coffee will be ready at the University Village location near 25th in a few minutes. You will get a text confirmation of your order.
